subject: 3D print horizontal mounts
description_text:
Hi guys,

I have the Pro X Ultra pedals and I'm really happy with them, but I want to try mounting the haptic motors horizontally (on the throttle and brake). I was thinking about getting this 3d printed locally, will it work?

https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:6905682

If not, could you let me know what dimensions I should ask for, like width and fastener spacing - so I can have an exact fit printed?

Regards,

Konstantin

conversations.body_text: Hi Konstantin Dragostinov,     A user previously made this 3D-printed bracket, but it has since been taken down.  Weâ€™ll send you the file on October 9th so you can print it yourself.  https://makerworld.com/zh/models/1589395-mount-for-simsonn-vam-pro

Hi guys, did you manage to find the 3D bracket? It's not urgent, but I do still want to print them.
________________________________
